thread.section_title: Movoto Real Estate Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Movoto Real Estate | movoto.com
thread.title: Bob
thread.title_full: Movoto Real Estate reviewed by Bob

author: Bob
title: Bob
text:
The agent assigned to work with us is James Carswell.
The agent is very friendly, responsive, understands our needs, willing to work with us, provided many listings for us to review, and available to show the property.
Was very responsive in getting us the contract once we made the decision to purchase the property, and was available for negotiation with the seller.
James worked fast and effectively. He answered our questions and provided information as we requested.
Would highly recommend James Carswell. Great agent.
Movoto-surfing their site is easy. However in the past the agents were not as reliable and responsive as James is. Therefore did not expect to make an offer and have a contract working through Movoto.
Thank you for good service this time.
